title: Anime Figurine Shop (Static App)
description: Explore a wide range of exclusive and limited-edition figurines from your favorite anime series.

title: CookEd (Static App)
description: CookEd lets you explore recipes, learn cooking skills, and master dishes from around the world.

title: Course Booking API Documentation
description: RESTful API for managing course enrollments with authentication, course CRUD operations, and Postman docs.

title: Course Booking App
description: MEVN stack app with user authentication, profile management, course creation, and student enrollment features.

title: E-commerce API Documentation
description: Dynamic E-Commerce Workflow Management with order processing, inventory updates, user authentication, and API docs via Postman.

title: E-commerce App
description: MEVN-based store with product filtering, cart updates, secure checkout, and real-time admin dashboard.

title: Fitness Tracker App
description: Log, track, and manage your workouts in real-time with a sleek full-stack app designed to keep you motivated and on track.

title: Movies Review App
description: A full-stack app where users can browse movies and leave comments. Includes user authentication and real-time comment management.

title: Blog App
description: A full-stack blogging platform where users can create, edit, and comment on posts. Includes user authentication and CRUD operations for posts and comments.
